name: Help The Robot
description:
Right now you cannot QUIT the game, so if you wanna quit make sure to use ALT+F4, or else just keep the game open forever

 I didn't have the time to play the built version, so I just playtested the version in the Unity Game engine (I had to stop developing 4 hours before the others because I had important stuff to do sadly) 

Hope you enjoy playing the game, ALL the art was made by me (LejoDev) 

The game is pretty easy and short, but has a cool plot twist at the end.

This game was made for the WOWIE Game Jam 4.0 hosted by Jonas Tyroller, so it was made in just a bit more than 2 days - Sleep and going out with family :)
